    • setTimeLimit

      public void setTimeLimit(String limit)
      Sets the time limit for a player. Accepts the time limit as String in the format- MM:SS. e.g. 10:30
      Parameters:
      limit - String time limit

    • manageUserTimeInput

      private int[] manageUserTimeInput(String time)
      Accepts a string time input in the format "MM:SS" Returns an array containing the minutes and seconds e.g for the input "10:30", it'd return {10, 30}
      Parameters:
      time - String time
      Returns:
      array of ints containing the minutes and seconds

    • isTimerOver

      public boolean isTimerOver()
      Returns true if the player is out of time, otherwise false.
      Returns:
      boolean value
